markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[More of Everything](/Rules.aspx?ID=1409)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 4 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The _Advanced Player's Guide_ expands upon the options for player characters provided in the Pathfinder _Core Rulebook_. Along with the new ancestries and classes summarized on the following page, there are also expanded rules for the existing ancestries and classes. Following these new options is an entire chapter of new archetypes, including multiclass archetypes for the four new classes as well as a huge selection of archetypes suitable for any character. New backgrounds, additional general feats and skill feats, and a bevy of new spells, equipment, and treasure round out your character's adventuring kit.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: More of Everything

Following these new options is an entire chapter of new archetypes, including multiclass archetypes for the four new classes as well as a huge selection of archetypes suitable for any character. New backgrounds, additional general feats and skill feats, and a bevy of new spells, equipment, and treasure round out your character's adventuring kit.
